content.rendered:
Directed by Ram Gopal Varma.

Written by P. Jaya Kumar. Ramkumar Singh. Nilesh Girkar.

Cast Amitabh Bachchan(Subhash Nagre / Sarkar). Yami Gautam(Annu Karkare). Manoj Bajpayee(Govind Deshpande). Abhishek Bachchan(Shankar (Dead in photograph)). Jackie Shroff(Michael Vallya). Ronit Roy(Gokul Satam). Amit Sadh(Shivaji Nagre / Cheeku). Rohini Hattangadi(Rukku Bai Devi). Supriya Pathak(Sarkar’s Wife). Parag Tyagi(Raman Guru). Bharat Dabholkar(Gorakh Rampur). Pradip Khairwar(Sarkar Gang man).Kamila Ratikant. Suhas Palshikar(CM Mohan Naik). Amal Sherawat(Bhosle). Mukesh Agrohari(Shetty). Bajrangbali Singh(Gandhi)

Language Hindi.

Producers Krishan Choudhary. Gopal Dalvi. Pradip Khairwar. Rahul Mittra. Praveen Nischol. Rahul Odak. Sudheer Chandra Padiri. Anand Pandit. Siddharth Patnaik. Ramesh Pulapaka.

Production AB Corp Ltd. Alumbra Entertainment Company.
